headline: Assessing Poolcorp (POOL) Valuation As Recent Share Momentum Follows A Year Of Weak Returns
summary: Pool stock: key returns and business snapshot Pool (POOL) has drawn interest after a period of mixed share performance, with the stock showing a gain over the past month but negative returns over the past year and past 3 months. At a recent close of $255.38, Pool sits against a backdrop of annual revenue of $5.29b and net income of $410.09m, reflecting its role as a large distributor of pool, irrigation, and outdoor living products.
